treatmentPolicies.name: Humane Treatment
treatmentPolicies.description: Full compliance with Geneva Convention. Good living conditions, medical care, recreation facilities, Red Cross visits.

treatmentPolicies.name: Standard Treatment
treatmentPolicies.description: Basic necessities provided according to customs of war. Adequate food, shelter, and medical care.

treatmentPolicies.name: Harsh Conditions
treatmentPolicies.description: Poor living conditions, minimal food, limited medical care. High mortality rate.

treatmentPolicies.name: Forced Labor Camps
treatmentPolicies.description: Prisoners used for construction, mining, agriculture, or war production. Long work hours, inadequate rest.

treatmentPolicies.name: Hold for Ransom
treatmentPolicies.description: Medieval/Renaissance practice. Keep high-ranking prisoners in reasonable comfort until ransom is paid.

treatmentPolicies.name: Summary Execution
treatmentPolicies.description: War crime. Execute prisoners. Severe diplomatic consequences and international condemnation.
